hero.title: Bannai - Building Materials Market
hero.supporting: B2B platform specializing in plumbing and building materials. Compare prices and order from certified suppliers.

suppliers.title: Our approved suppliers
suppliers.supporting: We work only with verified suppliers to ensure quality, reliability, and fair pricing for every order.

advantages.title: Our advantages
advantages.supporting: We combine quality, speed, and care so that you get the best result without unnecessary effort.

delivery.title: Fast delivery
delivery.description: Receive your order quickly - guaranteed delivery across all regions of the Kingdom.

pricing.title: Compare prices
pricing.description: Get instant quotes from trusted suppliers and choose the best offer for your needs.

upload.title: Upload your list
upload.description: Upload a photo or PDF of your materials list - we will find matching products for you.

categories.title: Main categories
categories.supporting: Quickly find the materials you need. Choose a category and explore ready offers from trusted suppliers.

plumbing.title: Plumbing connections
plumbing.description: Durable connectors for reliable water flow in any plumbing system.

upvc.title: UPVC fittings
upvc.description: Lightweight, corrosion-resistant fittings for modern piping solutions.

ppr.title: PPR fittings
ppr.description: High-pressure, heat-resistant fittings built for long-term performance.

ready.title: Ready to get started?
ready.supporting: Join hundreds of contractors and plumbers who use Bannai to save time and money.

footer.brandText: Join hundreds of contractors and plumbers who use Bannai to save time and money.

login.subtitle: Please enter your details to continue.

register.subtitle: Fill in the form below to create a new account.
